1.0.name: wordpress/alex-twitter-hashtag-grabber
1.0.description: Alex Hashtag Grabber allows you to grab tweets containing a specific hashtag from Twitter and embed them in any post or page. The best way to get fast support is by posting your question in a comment at http://anthony.strangebutfunny.net/my-plugins/twitter-hashtag-grabber/
